commit.message: GEODE-7845: Adding a cleaner simpler test.

nodes.bodyText: every test will shut down all the locator/servers and restart them again, making the tests taking longer. If you would like make the tests run faster, you can lump these two tests into one. first do region.clear in a client vm and then in a server vm. And would be nice to verify that after these two clears, the region still has those 2 records in them (clear didn't go through on any servers).

commit.message: GEODE-7845: better typing and another check added
